cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of secure data storage and transmission, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of regenerating codes involves the manipulation of data structures, which is a topic in data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the achievable tradeoff regions between storage capacity and repair bandwidth, which is a topic in signal processing (cs.SI) and computer networks (cs.CC).
